text:
@realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor Hi @realDonaldTrump,

Instead of worrying about signs & statues, why don't you worry about Americans who are dying from Covid-19? The number over 129k & rising. Your inaction is kills.

Sincerely,
Americans who are more concerned about dying from Covid-19 than a sign or statue

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
